item.Q:
Write the character:
cover; sheath; to encase; a case; to overlap; to interleave; bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names); harness; (classifier for sets, collections)
item.A:
tào
配套 pèitào to form a complete set

item.Q:
Write the character:
old (opposite of new); former
item.A:
traditional: 舊
jiù
仍旧 (仍舊) réngjiù still (remaining); to remain (the same); yet

item.Q:
Write the character:
mixed; miscellaneous; various; to mix
item.A:
traditional: 雜
zá
杂质 (雜質) zázhì impurity

item.Q:
Write the character:
to state; to tell; to narrate; to relate
item.A:
述 (strokes unavailable)
shù
上述 shàngshù above-mentioned

item.Q:
Write the character:
afraid; frightened; to fear
item.A:
恐 (strokes unavailable)
kǒng
恐怕 kǒngpà fear; to dread; I'm afraid that...; perhaps; maybe

liàng
明亮 míngliàng brightness

traditional: 麗
1: Lí 2: lì
美丽 (美麗) měilí beautiful 美丽 (美麗) měilì beautiful

item.Q:
Write the character:
(suff. for certain nouns); to hope; to wish; abbr. for Palestine, Palestinian; abbr. for Pakistan; bar (unit of pressure); surname Ba
item.A:
bā
巴黎 Bālí Paris (capital of France)

traditional: 禮
lǐ
礼拜 (禮拜) lǐbài week; religious service; worship

item.Q:
Write the character:
wine; liquor; spirits; alcoholic beverage
item.A:
jiǔ
酒精 jiǔjīng alcohol; same as ethanol 乙醇

rén
宋教仁 SòngJiàorén Song Jiaoren (1882-1913), politician of the revolutionary party involved in the 1911 Xinhai revolution, murdered in Shanghai in 1913

cān
聚餐 jùcān communal meal; formal dinner of club or group

item.Q:
Write the character:
cards; game pieces; signboard; plate; tablet
item.A:
牌 (strokes unavailable)
pái
招牌 zhāopái placard

item.Q:

to dash; to move forward quickly
item.A:
突 (strokes unavailable)
tū
突然 tūrán sudden; abrupt; unexpected

item.Q:

foot; leg; base; kick
item.A:
脚 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 腳
jiǎo

traditional: 劍
jiàn

item.Q:
Write the character: jí
(Jílín de jí)
item.A:
lucky; abbr. for Jilin 吉林 province in northeast China; surname Ji
吉林 Jílín Jilin province (Kirin) in northeast China, abbr. 吉, capital 長春|长春
shàngshù above-mentioned
tūrán sudden; abrupt; unexpected
tūchū prominent; give prominence to
lìzi case; (for) instance; example

traditional: 適宜
shìyí suitable; appropriate
xiōngdì brothers; brethren

traditional: 帶來
dàilái to bring; to bring about; to produce
zhōuqī a cycle

traditional: 為止
wéizhǐ until

traditional: 國外
guówài abroad; external (affairs); overseas; foreign

traditional: 大於
dàyú (idiom) used between nouns to indicate relative size or importance, A is greater than B

traditional: 自覺
zìjué conscious; aware; on one's own initiative; conscientious

traditional: 為人
wéirén behaviour; one's conduct
xiāochú to eliminate; to remove

traditional: 發達
fādá developed (country etc); flourishing; to develop

traditional: 推廣
tuīguǎng to extend; to spread; to popularize

traditional: 反復
fǎnfù repeatedly; over and over
zhùmíng famous; noted; well-known; celebrated

traditional: 發明
fāmíng to invent; invention

traditional: 東北
dōngběi northeast
